general_info.summary: This text provides a list of various topics and entities, including administrative details like course fees and recruiter information, a specific university campus in Uzbekistan and another in Agra, educational programs such as courses on human values and professional ethics and an international credit transfer program, a government portal for reporting cybercrime, and a mention of COVID-19 updates.
